quote_first: Oskar weighed the wristwatch in his hand, then gave the rather fine piece with its luminous dial showing
quote_last: to little Pinchcoal. He looked up inquiringly at his chief. Störtebeker nodded his assent. And Oskar said, as he adjusted his drum snugly for the trip home: 'Jesus will lead the way. Follow thou me!'
title: The Tin Drum
author: Günter Grass
